archimate:ApplicationService.name: [web] Web Service
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation:
Archimate 3: http://pubs.opengroup.org/architecture/archimate3-doc/chap09.html#_Toc302490429 An application service represents an explicitly defined exposed application behavior.
Smileham: Functionality internal to an application which has been exposed to another application/process, mainly via API, e.g. REST/SOAP web services.
